title: How to Get The Job, Dealing with Job Loss + Internship/Career Tips with Lauren Berger
itunes:title: How to Get The Job, Dealing with Job Loss + Internship/Career Tips with Lauren Berger
description:
Brooke is joined by Lauren Berger, the Intern/Career Queen, to discuss everything from job loss due to the pandemic to negotiating your salary!
